title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Investor Compensation Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Investor Compensation Act 

1998 (Prescription of Bodies and Persons) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 August 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited investor compensation act 1998 (prescription body persons) (amendment) regulation 2020 (2) regulation come operation 1 august 2020

title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: 2. The Investor Compensation Act 1998 (Prescription of Bodies and
text_raw:
2. The Investor Compensation Act 1998 (Prescription of Bodies and 
Persons) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 395 of 2015) are amended by the 
substitution of the following for paragraph (c) of Regulation 2: 

“(c) Caroline Gill;” 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Finance, 

20 July, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th July, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [255] 3

title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of these Regulations is to provide for the nomination of a person 
for appointment as director of The Investor Compensation Company DAC. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [255]
